# Full-Stack Portfolio Website Project

## Project Overview
This is a comprehensive portfolio website featuring:
- React frontend with dynamic content management
- Node.js/Express backend with JWT authentication  
- MongoDB Atlas database integration
- Admin panel for content management
- SEO optimization and Google Analytics
- Blog system with comments and pagination
- Portfolio showcase with filtering
- Contact forms and Google Maps integration

## Technology Stack
- **Frontend:** React 18, React Router, React Helmet, Framer Motion
- **Backend:** Node.js, Express, JWT, Bcrypt
- **Database:** MongoDB Atlas, Mongoose ODM
- **SEO:** Dynamic meta tags, structured data
- **Analytics:** Google Analytics integration
- **Deployment:** Netlify/Vercel frontend, MongoDB Atlas backend

## Development Guidelines
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Modern ES6+ JavaScript and React hooks
- RESTful API design patterns
- JWT-based authentication
- Dynamic content management
- SEO best practices
- Performance optimization with lazy loading
